title: Tie-Dye, From Stylish to Traditional
description: The textile technique has gotten celebrity attention again this season, but it’s always been part of the arts scene in places like Nigeria and Japan.
media:credit: Ksenia Kuleshova for The New York Times
media:description: Hiroyuki Murase, the chief executive and creative director of the fashion and interiors company Suzusan, in Düsseldorf, Germany.
